item.title: How NLP Improves Multilingual Text-to-Speech & Voice Assistants
item.description: In the rapidly evolving world of technology, Natural Language Processing (NLP) plays a pivotal role in reshaping how machines understand and generate human language. Among its many applications, NLP significantly enhances multilingual text-to-speech (TTS) technology and voice assistants, making them more robust and user-friendly. This blog post will explore the transformative impact of NLP on TTS systems, focusing on its ability to improve language understanding, pronunciation accuracy, and overall user experienceâ€”especially for non-native speakers.
